modName: Series - ACE - Armor - No Perk Changes
summary: Bigger difference between light & heavy playing styles. Heavy armor has a chance to absorb damage. Light armor has a chance to Dodge. Heavy armor is less prone to arrows, daggers, swords, and one-handed axes, but is more vulnerable to magic. Armor limits casting ability and stamina regen. Spell Failure introduced. Both heavy and light armor ratings
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[color=008080][size=3][b]Athyra\'s Comprehensive Enhancements - ACE - Armor[/b][/size][/color]

[color=008000][size=4][b]What this Mod does[/b][/size][/color]
 * Heavy Armor has a [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14495-1-1334313478.jpg]chance to absorb damage[/url] depending on skill level.
 * Light Armor [b]or unarmored[/b] has a [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14495-2-1334313481.jpg]chance to dodge attacks[/url] depending on skill level.
 * Heavy Armor is [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14495-1-1333823722.jpg]5% more resistant to damage from Arrows, Daggers, Swords, and 1-handed Axes but is 5% more vulnerable to spell damage[/url].
 * Magicka & [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14495-3-1333823723.jpg]Stamina[/url] Regen, Spell Failure, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14495-2-1333823723.jpg]Sneak Ability, and Movement Speed[/url] change according to skill level.

[color=008080][size=3][b] Light Armor or Unarmored (including robes)[/b][/size][/color]
[b]If Light Armor skill lvl is under 33[/b]
6% chance to completely dodge attacks, but 1% chance to take 2x damage.
[b]If Light Armor skill level between 33 and 66[/b]
12% chance to completely dodge attacks, but 3% chance to take 1.7x damage.
[b]If Light Armor skill level over 66[/b]
20% chance to completely dodge attacks, but 5% chance to take 1.5x damage.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14495-2-1334313481.jpg]( click to see Active Effect info )[/url]

[color=008080][size=3][b] Light Armor[/b][/size][/color]
[b]If Light Armor skill lvl is under 30[/b]
-25% magicka regen & 10% spell failure & -20% sneak
[b]If Light Armor skill level between 30 and 70[/b]
-20% magicka regen & 5% spell failure & -10% sneak
[b]If Light Armor skill level over 70[/b]
-15% magicka regen & no spell failure & no sneak penalty

[color=008080][size=3][b] Heavy Armor[/b][/size][/color]
[b]If Heavy Armor skill lvl is under 33[/b]
12% chance for the armor to absorb 1/2 of incoming damage
[b]If Heavy Armor skill level between 33 and 66[/b]
24% chance for the armor to absorb 1/2 of incoming damage
[b]If Heavy Armor skill level 66 or more[/b]
40% chance for the armor to absorb 1/2 of incoming damage
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/14495-1-1334313478.jpg]( click to see Active Effect info )[/url]
- & -
[b]If Heavy Armor skill lvl is under 30[/b]
-40% magicka regen & 20% spell failure & -30% stamina regen & -80% sneak & -20% speed
[b]If Heavy Armor skill level between 30 and 70[/b]
-35% magicka regen & 10% spell failure & -25% stamina regen & -60% sneak & -15% speed
[b]If Heavy Armor skill level over 70[/b]
-30% magicka regen & 5% spell failure & -20% stamina regen & -40% sneak & -10% speed

 * These will happen automatically after reaching the skill level. 
 * Heavy Armor ratings are reduced by 20%
 * Light Armor ratings are reduced by 25%

[b]Notes
[color=00809e] * A more elaborate version of this mod including many perks:  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10634]Armor Overhaul - Heavy and Light[/url] *[/color]
 * Spell Failure means complete mana drain. Be careful! *
 * All armor effects are displayed in \"Active Effects\" if you want to check. * [/b]


[color=008080][size=3][b] Total armor bonus[/b][/size][/color]
 - Light = +134% ( 2 * 1.25 * 1.25 * [b]0.75[/b] )
 - Heavy = +150% ( 2 * 1.25 * 1.25  * [b]0.8[/b] )
 - Vanilla = +212% ( 2 * 1.25 * 1.25 ) - vanilla heavy and light have the same values, identical
Remember Heavy armor has a 40% chance to absorb 1/2 damage and Light armor a 20% chance to dodge!

[color=008000][size=4][b]The Goal of this Mod[/b][/size][/color]
- balance and diversify the use of armor giving them stronger more distinct roles
- widen the gap of similarity between the armor-types
- prevent mages from using heavy armor
- make light armored mages possible but more strategy is needed
- make heavy armor characters not be able to run as far or as long as in light armor
- make mage robes the best possible clothes for mages
- make heavy armor more defensive than light armor

[color=008000][size=4][b]Mod Compatibility[/b][/size][/color]
- Just in case, please back up your saved game! Especially if you use many mods. I can\'t test all scenarios!
- Compatible with all mods I know of.
- This mod can safely be added and removed mid-game.
- All magic effects in this mod were duplicated and don\'t depend on the base effects. Other mods modifying similar effects are be compatible.
- Still not sure? - ask in the discussion thread, I will try to help!


[color=008000][size=4][b]Install[/b][/size][/color]
Use the mod-manager or unzip the contents to the Data folder.
If you see this message the next time you load your game, then it was successful!
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/10634-1-1333377294.jpg[/img]
If you are updating I recommend doing a clean save first.


[color=008000][size=4][b]Suggestions:[/b][/size][/color]
 Suggestions and criticisms are welcome. I will try to include the best ideas and consider the best revisions!
 Regarding my response time to bugs and updates and comment section replies;
I live in Japan and work 6 days a week with long/odd hours.
Modding is pretty much my hobby now with a little play-time now and then.
In other words, I\'m probably sleeping while most of you are awake and can\'t focus on major changes most days. 
[b]Please be understanding of this.[/b]


[color=008000][size=5][b]Mod Recommendations[/b][/size][/color][size=4]
 * [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10037]ACE - Archery[/url] *
 * [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10521]ACE - Crafting[/url] *
 * [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13502]ACE - Melee[/url] *
 * [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13976]ACE - Synergy[/url] *[/size]

For some swimming and water interaction realism I recommend [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13736]Better Swimming[/url] by n1t0r.



[/center]
